refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns a value from an instrument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Return will return a value from an instrument at i-time. The value of a global instrument (instrument 0) can be retrieved after compilation by the evalstr opcode. The retrieval of values returned by other instruments is not yet implemented.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ival -- a value to be returned by instrument.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the return opcode in conjunction with evalcode:
ival evalstr "return 2 + 2" print ival
